---
title: "The Faculties of Business Administration and Biology join the OSC"
date: 2023-01-25
subtitle: "The OSC welcomes these faculties as financially supporting institutional members!"
categories: ["New Members"]
---


<p>The Faculty of Business Administration, represented by <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/elsas/index.html" title="Elsas">Prof. Dr. Ralf Elsas</a>, former OSC scientific board member (2017-2023) and the Faculty of Biology, represented by OSC scientific board member <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/dingemanse/index.html" title="Dingemanse">Prof. Dr. Niels Dingemanse</a> (2023-2025), have joined the OSC as financially contributing institutional members. Researchers from these faculties will have priority access to our training events with a restricted number of seats.</p>
